creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four total lines of calligraphy: two full lines; third line is shorter; fourth line is broken, containing signature at lower left; red seal URC; two seals, one inverted, at LLC
markings: URC, red seal; LLC, two red seals; on back, top edge near ULC, in pencil: [Umetsuji Kiretsu]
title: Quatrain in Running Script
